heroLandingPage.content: Your gateway to Moldovan universities. We handle international applications for all universities in Moldova. We review your documents and guide you through the process.
heroLandingPage.heading: Study in Moldova

featuresWhyStudyInMoldova1.feature1Description: Moldova offers high-quality education with a simple application process and visa-free entry for many international students. Check today if you qualify!
featuresWhyStudyInMoldova1.feature2Description: Moldovan institutions like Moldova State University and the Technical University of Moldova are listed in the QS Europe University Rankings.
featuresWhyStudyInMoldova1.feature3Description: Moldovan students show continuous improvement in global assessments, reflecting quality-driven reforms.

cta.heading: Start your journey to study in Moldova today!

featuresWhyStudyInMoldova2.feature1Description: With a literacy rate of 99.6%, Moldova provides a strong academic foundation for international students.
featuresWhyStudyInMoldova2.feature2Description: Studying in Moldova is cost-effective compared to many other European countries, making it an attractive option for international students.
featuresWhyStudyInMoldova2.feature3Description: Moldova is committed to quality education, with 6.25% of GDP allocated to public education in 2023 – more than the global average of 4.4%. This ensures well-funded universities, qualified professors, and modern learning resources. With a youth literacy rate of 99.7% and a primary school student-teacher ratio of 17.9.

featureSteps.stepsDescription: Follow these simple steps to begin your academic journey in Moldova. Our platform guides you through each stage, from creating your account to applying to your desired program.
featureSteps.heading: Study in Moldova

1.title: 1. Create Account
1.description: Create your account and confirm your email. This is your first step toward studying in Moldova.

2.title: 2. Browse & Save Programs
2.description: Check if your qualifications meet the requirements of Moldovan universities.

3.title: 3. Research Universities
3.description: Prepare all required documents according to our checklist and review them.

4.title: 4. Upload Documents
4.description: Browse study programs from our partner universities and choose your favorites.

5.title: 5. Submit Application
5.description: Submit your application and pay the processing fee through our secure platform.

6.title: 6. Track Progress
6.description: Track your application status and receive real-time updates.

7.title: 7. Get Support
7.description: Contact us anytime with questions or for support throughout the entire process.

featureLocations.description: Moldova is not a big country, and while there are universities in other cities, most opportunities for higher education can be found in the capital city, Chișinău.
